captain hummer (custom).name: Captain Hummer  (Custom)
captain hummer (custom).traits: Whispering Aura.  At the start of each of the warlock's turns, each creature of its choice within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage, provided that the warlock isn't incapacitated.
captain hummer (custom).spellcasting:
Spellcasting.  The warlock casts one of the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15): 
   At will: Detect Magic, Guidance, Levitate, Mage Armor (self only), Mage Hand, Minor Illusion, Prestidigitation
   1/day each: Arcane Gate, Detect Thoughts, True Seeing
captain hummer (custom).actions:
Multiattack.  Captain Hummer makes two Rapier attacks.

Rapier.  Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

Howling Void (Recharge 5-6).  Captain Hummer opens a momentary rift to the bottom of the sea within 60 feet of him. The rift is a briny, 20-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 (3d8) psychic damage and is frightened of Captain Hummer until the start of his next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't frightened.

lucianna the merciful (custom).name: Lucianna the Merciful  (Custom)
lucianna the merciful (custom).spellcasting:
Spellcasting.  Lucianna casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):
   At will: Dancing Lights, Disguise Self, Mage Hand, Prestidigitation
   2/day each: Fireball, Mage Armor, Unseen Servant
   1/day each: Fly, Stinking Cloud, Web
lucianna the merciful (custom).actions:
Multiattack.  Lucianna makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

Arcane Burst.  Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d10 + 3) force damage.
lucianna the merciful (custom).bonus:
Benign Transportation (Recharge 4-6).  Lucianna teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that she can see. If she instead chooses a space within range that is occupied by a willing Small or Medium creature, they both teleport, swapping places.

Summon Elemental (1/Day).  Lucianna magically summons an air elemental, an earth elemental, a fire elemental, or a water elemental. The elemental appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Lucianna, whom it obeys. It takes its turn immediately after Lucianna. It lasts for 1 hour, until it or Lucianna dies, or until Lucianna dismisses it as a bonus action.

bander eighttails (custom).name: Bander Eighttails  (Custom)
bander eighttails (custom).traits: Keen Hearing and Sight.  Bander has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.
bander eighttails (custom).actions:
Multiattack.  Bander makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

Shortsword.  Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

Longbow.  Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
